introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and handle your personal information when you use our website and services. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring you have a positive experience on our site.

information.title: Information We Collect
information.subtitle: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.subtitle: We use the information we collect to:

items.notices: Send you technical notices and support messages
items.communication: Communicate with you about products, services, and events

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

items.object: Object to processing of your data

what.title: What are Cookies?
what.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit our website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide useful information to website owners.

types.title: Types of Cookies We Use
types.subtitle: We use different types of cookies for various purposes:

items.essential: Essential cookies: Required for the website to function properly
items.functional: Functional cookies: Remember your preferences and settings
items.analytics: Analytics cookies: Help us understand how visitors use our website
items.marketing: Marketing cookies: Used to deliver relevant advertisements

usage.title: How We Use Cookies
usage.subtitle: We use cookies for the following purposes:

items.authentication: Authentication: To keep you signed in and secure
items.preferences: Preferences: To remember your settings and choices
items.security: Security: To protect your account and prevent fraud
items.analytics: Analytics: To understand how visitors interact with our website

management.title: Managing Cookies
management.content: You have control over the cookies used on our website. Here's how you can manage them:

browser.title: Browser Settings
browser.content: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings preferences. You can set your browser to refuse cookies or delete certain cookies. However, if you choose to block or delete cookies, some features of our website may not function properly.

third-party.title: Third-Party Cookies
third-party.content: Some cookies are placed by third-party services that appear on our pages. We do not control the use of these cookies and cannot access them due to the way that cookies work, as cookies can only be accessed by the party who originally set them.

agreement.title: 1. Agreement to Terms
agreement.content: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

license.title: 2. Use License
license.content: Permission is granted to temporarily access the materials (information or software) on our website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only.
license.subtitle: This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:

items.commercial: Use the materials for any commercial purpose
items.reverse: Attempt to decompile or reverse engineer any software contained on the website
items.copyright: Remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials

account.title: 3. User Account
account.content: If you create an account on the website, you are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and you are fully responsible for all activities that occur under the account.

items.security: Maintain the security of your account and password
items.accuracy: Provide accurate and complete information when creating your account
items.notify: Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account

disclaimer.title: 4. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The materials on our website are provided on an 'as is' basis. We make no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaim and negate all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property.

limitations.title: 5. Limitations
limitations.content: In no event shall we or our suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on our website.

revisions.title: 6. Revisions and Errata
revisions.content: The materials appearing on our website could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. We do not warrant that any of the materials on our website are accurate, complete, or current.

links.title: 7. Links
links.content: We have not reviewed all of the sites linked to our website and are not responsible for the contents of any such linked site. The inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by us of the site.

modifications.title: 8. Modifications
modifications.content: We may revise these terms of service for our website at any time without notice. By using this website, you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these terms of service.

law.title: 9. Governing Law
law.content: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws and you irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that location.
